businesses.name: Appetite Catering
businesses.business_details:
Appetite Catering is an ‘all purpose’ caterer who has been serving the Melbourne corporate and private sectors with great tasting food for 14 years.

Like many caterers, Appetite has been hit hard by the current environment. As a result it has reinvented itself by offering delicious home made meals at very affordable prices. Appetite’s focus is to keep its loyal and talented staff working through these times.
businesses.product_details: We are a corporate caterer who’s food philosophy is fresh, simple, delicious! We believe in using real ingredients to make honest, good quality food. We enjoy what we do and we are proud of our profession and our food.
businesses.new_products:
- Changed operating hours – office hours are 9am-3.30pm Monday to Friday.  The Tuck Shop (hole in the wall shop) hours are 7am-3.30pm Monday to Friday.
- Now offering free home delivery of house-made frozen heat & eat meals.  We also have a hole in the wall take away shop (The Tuck Shop) for coffee, lunch items, sweets, hot food.  The frozen heat & eat meals are also available to purchase through the shop.
- New online store – new menu is available on our website
- Now offering delivery – home delivery now available for heat & eat home meals
businesses.headline: Taking the stress out of home cooking by delivering fresh, simple & delicious frozen meals to your door.
